comments:

Actually, also, selecting the columns header

The exception is caused by an inner class action filter that is added to the TableTreeColumnGraphicalEditPart from it's WidgetPropertySourceAdpator.

I removed the BeanPropertySourceAdapter.getAdapter() method which created this innerclass action filter... it's not used for anything and causes this problem because it assume the source adapter is the same as the editpart passed in.

Fixed and release to HEAD for 1.2M1
